summary: Increases the magnitude of the Disarm shout, allowing it to be used on higher level opponents (as well as yourself).
descriptionHtml:
The Disarm shout has always been underwhelming in my opinion, only disarming enemies level 30 or lower when used at maximum power. By the time I had all three words, the shout was useless to me. The concept, however, was amazing. You yell, and the enemies drop their weapons. What's not to love?

So I changed it.

[size=3][b]Features:
[/b][/size]- The Disarm shout's effectiveness has been increased so as to work on enemies above level 30.
- Three different .esp files, increasing the shout magnitude to 30/40/50 [b]or [/b]50/70/90 [b]or [/b]80/90/100 respectively.
- Any Draugr using the shout will be able to disarm you, provided your level is low enough. This is because the increase is not only for [i]your[/i] shout, but for [i]the[/i] shout. Be careful when fighting them!
[size=3][b]
Installation:
[/b][/size]Simply download any of the thee .esp files (pick only one!) and place it in your data folder, make sure it is below any mods that may alter the Disarm shout, otherwise there might be conflicts. To uninstall, simply remove the .esp file.
